title: Riot pls donate me 1rp <3 new project hextech boxes
body:
im 1 ip off buying the decrytper icon pls riot <3

https://gyazo.com/5e9ac477b5964bc81590e5a07a95f1c4
screenshot of my 74 ip

replies.body:
Hey there,

I hear the [wonderful little fairies over at PS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) will be able to do this, but you have to give them a gift of some artwork first.
